name: pink-i-am
description:
first game - please don't ask me about the name

featuring music from garage band iphone by non musically talented individual (me)

i didn't have a thumbnail so i just used the sprite sheet because it kinda worked

the windows version scuffed out so thats probably not good

i haven't touched this in 2 months

i can't be bothered to fix this

hopefully fun!

edit: i fixed it so be happy

don't press the quit button because it doesn't work and freezes the game (it was for windows)

one of the buttons got really big randomly but i think its fixed

anyway it functions so all good
